content:
deep fried foods are a staple at the State Fair PERIOD





When  a.m PERIOD today

Where Oklahoma Memorial Unions East Lawn

Price Free

For many the best part of the Oklahoma State Fair is the menu PERIOD The fair kicks off tomorrow but not everyone can make it right away PERIOD Thankfully The Union Programming Board is helping to satisfy deepfried cravings this year with its firstever Sooner Fried event at  a.m PERIOD today on the Oklahoma Memorial Unions East Lawn PERIOD

UPB officer Parisa Pilehvar is the Sooner Fried organizer and said she is excited to bring some of her favorite fair foods to campus PERIOD

We just wanted to bring the fair to OU for kids who wouldnt be able to make it she said PERIOD

The event will feature fried chicken pickles okra and Oreos as well as a selfserve caramel apple bar PERIOD There will also be a balloon dart station to add to the carnival atmosphere she said PERIOD

Union Catering will be cooking for the event and Pilehvar said she recommends that hungry students arrive early to ensure they get their pick of great fried food PERIOD

Pihlevar said she hopes to continue Sooner Fried in future years but that decision will be based on the success of todays event PERIOD

Anyone interested in joining the Union Programming Board to play a role in future events like these should attend the UPB meeting at  p.m PERIOD tonight in the Associates Room in the Union Pilhevar said PERIOD

Robust news organizations like ours generate civic good that informs improves and inspires communities PERIOD For those invested in OU and Norman OU Daily uniquely has

CONTRIBUTE TO OUR MISSION PERIOD
title: Union event provides State Fair food experience | Life | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
